FAQ

  • How to update template?

    Once you download the new updates from Themeforest, simply replace the new "assets" folder with previous "assets" folder in your projects.

    Thats it! Your are now updated and ready to go.

  • How to update melux?

    Once you download the new updates from Themeforest, simply replace the new "assets" folder with previous "assets" folder in your projects.

    Thats it! Your are now updated and ready to go.
